Circuit String Converter (fd_greens.circuit_string_converter)

class CircuitStringConverter(qubits: Sequence[cirq.ops.raw_types.Qid])[source]

Bases: object

Converter between Cirq circuits and Qtrl strings.

Initializes a CircuitStringConverter object.

Parameters

qubits – The qubits in the circuit.

convert_strings_to_circuit(qtrl_strings: List[List[str]]) → cirq.circuits.circuit.Circuit[source]

Converts Qtrl strings to a Cirq circuit.

The Qtrl strings are saved in HDF5 files. To convert the Qtrl strings saved in lih_3A.h5 to a Cirq circuit, we need to

import sys
sys.path.append('path/to/fd_greens')

import h5py
import json
import cirq

from fd_greens import CircuitStringConverter

qubits = cirq.LineQubit.range(4)
converter = CircuitStringConverter(qubits)

h5file = h5py.File('lih_3A.h5', 'r')
qtrl_strings = json.loads(h5file['circ0d/transpiled'][()])
circuit = converter.convert_strings_to_circuit(qtrl_strings)
Parameters

qtrl_strings – Qtrl strings.

Returns

circuit – A Cirq circuit corresponding to the Qtrl strings.

convert_circuit_to_strings(circuit: cirq.circuits.circuit.Circuit) → List[List[str]][source]

Converts a Cirq circuit to Qtrl strings.

This function optionally wraps around iToffoli gates with Z and CPhase gates.

Parameters

circuit – A Cirq circuit.

Returns

qtrl_strings – The Qtrl strings corresponding to the Cirq circuit.

adapt_to_hardware(circuit: cirq.circuits.circuit.Circuit) → cirq.circuits.circuit.Circuit[source]

Adapts a circuit to hardware by converting to native gates.

This function handles adjusting CS/CSD gates on specific qubit pairs, and splitting simultaneous CZ gates onto different moments.

Parameters

circuit – The circuit on which gates are to be adapted.

Returns

circuit_new – The new circuit after gate adaptation.

load_circuit(h5fname: Union[str, h5py._hl.files.File], dsetname: str) → cirq.circuits.circuit.Circuit[source]

Loads a circuit from an HDF5 file.

save_circuit(h5fname: Union[str, h5py._hl.files.File], dsetname: str, circuit: cirq.circuits.circuit.Circuit, return_dataset: bool = True) → None[source]

Saves a circuit to an HDF5 file.
